summary: Spice the cat knows something is up and she is not wrong: Tonight I am heading to Europe, where I will be for the next two weeks.  First in Oslo for Norcon, where I am a guest of honor, and then in Glasgow for the Worldcon there, where I am DJing a dance and also, […]
title: “And Just Where Do You Think YOU’RE Going?”

summary:
Today's FiftyIn50 blogging challenge question is:
What are your favourite books and why. 
As anyone who reads knows, there is no definitive list of favourite books, as each time we read a new book it might be added to the list thereby knocking off another.  I could tell you what my top fav scifi books are of this moment, or what historical fiction novels I love...
title: My Favourite Books

summary: Cloudflare reports on the state of applications security.  It claims that 6. 8% of Internet traffic is malicious...
title: Nearly 7% of Internet Traffic Is Malicious
